name: kowus.xyz
description: Hi, I am Barnabas, a Windows and Web developer from Koforidua, Ghana. I am passionate about development, interaction, and effecting change through STEM. I love to teach, and walk students through simple building blocks of algorithms. I also love to build lesson examples to help beginners understand certain programming languages and conventions.
author: Barnabas Mawukley Nomo (Kowus)
